REASON: I felt overly happy at first and it definitely blocked the pain.  BUT later, felt confused and depressed.  This is not the first time lidocaine has affected me badly emotion-wise.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR LIDOCAINE: My husband says it is because of the accelerant added to lidocaine, which raises heart rate and allows the med administrator to make sure they don't overdose the patient on the med.
They gave me a shot of lidocaine on my upper left eyelid to remove a wart on february 21, 2007
